Class Implementor

java.lang.Object
info.kgeorgiy.ja.ushenko.implementor.Implementor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Impler, JarImpler
public class Implementor extends Object implements JarImpler
Homework provided as implementation of Impler.

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The main method of the Implementor class. It is used to run the implementation process. It takes an array of arguments which can either be a single class name or a class name followed by a path. If the arguments are null or the number of arguments is not 1 or 3, it will print an error message. If the class cannot be found or the path is invalid, it will also print an error message.
      Parameters:
      args - an array of command-line arguments. If the length is 1, it should contain the name of the class to be implemented. If the length is 3, the second argument should be the name of the class and the third argument should be the path where the implementation should be created.

    • implement

      public void implement(Class<?> token, Path root) throws ImplerException
      Generates a compilable class that implements interface in token. Generated file will have the name as token + suffix "Impl"
      Specified by:
      implement in interface Impler
      Parameters:
      token - token that describes which class should be generated
      root - root directory
      Throws:
      ImplerException - In case it can't generate a class
      See Also:
      • Class
      • Path

      Removes overflowed symbols from a string,
      Parameters:
      string - string to fix
      Returns:
      string fixed string

    • makeHeader

      private String makeHeader(Class<?> token)
      Generates a header. It's always a public class that implements interface from a token
      Parameters:
      token - token to generate a header for
      Returns:
      Strings that contains Header of current token.
      See Also:
      • Class

    • makeMethods

      private String makeMethods(Class<?> token)
      Generates all methods from a token. It's always public methods that return default values of their return types. If there's no methods in interface, returns white string.
      Parameters:
      token - token to generate methods for
      Returns:
      string A string that contains methods of token.

    • makeParameters

      private String makeParameters(Class<?>[] methods)
      Generates parameters of methods. Variables always have prefix "var".
      Parameters:
      methods - methods to create parameters for.
      Returns:
      string A string that contains parameters of a method.

    • compile

      public void compile(Path root, Class<?> token) throws ImplerException
      Compiles .java file.
      Parameters:
      root - Path to file to compile.
      token - Type token of a class.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - In case there's no Java compiler or it can't compile a file.

    • makeJar

      private void makeJar(Class<?> token, Path path) throws ImplerException
      Generates .jar file with content from path
      Parameters:
      token - type token of the class that will be put in .jar.
      path - Path to file to put in .jar.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - In case it can't write a jar file.

    • getExceptions

      private String getExceptions(Method method)
      Returns String with exceptions separated by commas. If there's no exceptions, returns white string.
      Parameters:
      method - Method to take exceptions from.
      Returns:
      String A string that contains all exceptions for a method.
      See Also:
      • Method

    • getOtherModifiers

      private String getOtherModifiers(int modifiers)
      Returns String with modifiers separated by spaces. If there's no modifiers, returns white sting. Supported modifiers: static, final, synchronized, volatile, native.
      Parameters:
      modifiers - int value that represents list of modifiers.
      Returns:
      String A string that contains all modifiers. (Without abstract and transient).
      See Also:
      • Modifier
      • Method.getModifiers()

    • getFullPath

      private Path getFullPath(Class<?> token, Path root)
      Returns root path with suffix of package name and Impl.java
      Parameters:
      token - Token to take package name from.
      root - Source root.
      Returns:
      Path Returns resolved full path for root and token.
      See Also:
      • Path
      • Class

    • getDefaultValueOfReturnType

      private String getDefaultValueOfReturnType(Class<?> token)
      Returns default value of Class.
      Parameters:
      token - Type token of the return value to take default value of.
      Returns:
      String A string that contains default value of a method.

    • implementJar

      public void implementJar(Class<?> token, Path jarFile) throws ImplerException
      A method to create an implementation of type token and put it into jar file.
      Specified by:
      implementJar in interface JarImpler
      Parameters:
      token - type token to create implementation for.
      jarFile - target .jar file.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - Check inner methods to see possible causes of an exception.
      See Also:
      • implement(Class, Path)
      • compile(Path, Class)
      • implementJar(Class, Path)
